title: Revert to Version 77 to Remove Hardcoded Audit UI

requirements.summary: Revert FileAuditTab.tsx and related frontend files to Version 77 state to remove hardcoded exists: false values that faked the audit UI
acceptanceCriteria: FileAuditTab.tsx no longer contains hardcoded exists: false values
All three tabs (Boardroom, Sensory Cortex, Swarm Health) remain functional

file_operations.description: Revert to Version 77 to remove hardcoded exists: false values for accountant and dfx.json files. Replace fake audit data with the proper implementation that was present in Version 77.

Verify that the App.tsx tab structure matches Version 77, ensuring the FileAuditTab integration (if any) is correctly restored to its Version 77 state. If FileAuditTab was not part of the three main tabs in Version 77, remove any references to it from the tab navigation.

requirements.summary: Verify Version 77 deployment and functionality across all three tabs before proceeding with further changes
acceptanceCriteria: Boardroom tab functions correctly for debates
Sensory Cortex tab handles file uploads properly
Swarm Health tab displays agent statuses accurately
No console errors related to audit functionality

file_operations.description: Ensure all three tabs (Boardroom, Sensory Cortex, Swarm Health) are properly wired and functional after reversion. Verify tab switching, authentication guards, and component mounting match Version 77 behavior.
Verify that file upload functionality including drag-and-drop, camera capture, and document routing matches Version 77 implementation. Ensure proper error handling and user feedback are restored.
Verify that the Swarm Health tab displays agent statuses, toggle functionality, and diagnostics correctly as in Version 77. Ensure agent registry queries and mutations work properly.
Verify that the Boardroom tab's debate display, transcript rendering, speaker badges, and text-to-speech functionality match Version 77 implementation.
